languages.text: "И правильно, не волноваться — это хорошо! Я вот больше не волнуюсь, к чему вся эта суета? Обо всем, что вас должно волновать мы первые услышим и вам расскажем. Но не Идира — Идира вас больше волновать не должна. Ведь я не одна, и мне так хорошо и так безопасно! Да, голосочки-шепоточки мои?" {n}Псайкер безумно хихикает, после чего ударяется в воркующее бессвязное бормотание.{/n}

"And rightly so — not worrying is a good thing! I'm not worrying anymore — why make such a fuss? We'll be the first to hear and tell you about everything you should be worried about. But Idira won't be one of them — she won't be worrying you anymore. After all, I'm not alone, and I feel so good and so safe! Isn't that right, my little whisperers?" {n}She giggles madly, then descends into incoherent cooing and mumbling.{/n}

Но не Идира — Идира вас больше волновать не должна. Ведь я не одна, и мне так хорошо и так безопасно! Да, голосочки-шепоточки мои?" {n}Псайкер безумно хихикает, после чего ударяется в воркующее бессвязное бормотание.{/n}

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Y hace bien. ¡No preocuparse es bueno! Yo ya no me preocupo; ¿para qué? Seremos los primeros en enterarnos y le contaremos todo lo que sí sea preocupante. Pero no será Idira, oh, no; ella ya no volverá a preocuparle. ¡Después de todo no estoy sola, y me siento muy bien, me siento segura! ¿Verdad que sí, murmullitos?». {n}Ríe como loca y luego se pone a canturrear y farfullar incoherencias.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And rightly so — not worrying is a good thing! I'm not worrying anymore — why make such a fuss? We'll be the first to hear and tell you about everything you should be worried about. But Idira won't be one of them — she won't be worrying you anymore. After all, I'm not alone, and I feel so good and so safe! Isn't that right, my little whisperers?" {n}She giggles madly, then descends into incoherent cooing and mumbling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y hace bien. ¡No preocuparse es bueno! Yo ya no me preocupo; ¿para qué? Seremos los primeros en enterarnos y le contaremos todo lo que sí sea preocupante. Pero no será Idira, oh, no; ella ya no volverá a preocuparle. ¡Después de todo no estoy sola, y me siento muy bien, me siento segura! ¿Verdad que sí, murmullitos?». {n}Ríe como loca y luego se pone a canturrear y farfullar incoherencias.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「そのとおり。心配しないのはいいことよ！あたいはどうでもいい存在なんだから、こんなに騒ぐこともないでしょう？陛下が懸念すべきことを真っ先に聞いて報告しましょう。でも、イディラは例外よ。彼女が御身に迷惑をかけることはないでしょうからね。そもそもあたいはひとりではないし、気分もいいし安全なのよ！そうでしょう、囁きたち？」{n}彼女は狂ったように笑い、支離滅裂な鳴き声とつぶやきを発し続ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And rightly so — not worrying is a good thing! I'm not worrying anymore — why make such a fuss? We'll be the first to hear and tell you about everything you should be worried about. But Idira won't be one of them — she won't be worrying you anymore. After all, I'm not alone, and I feel so good and so safe! Isn't that right, my little whisperers?" {n}She giggles madly, then descends into incoherent cooing and mumbling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおり。心配しないのはいいことよ！あたいはどうでもいい存在なんだから、こんなに騒ぐこともないでしょう？陛下が懸念すべきことを真っ先に聞いて報告しましょう。でも、イディラは例外よ。彼女が御身に迷惑をかけることはないでしょうからね。そもそもあたいはひとりではないし、気分もいいし安全なのよ！そうでしょう、囁きたち？」{n}彼女は狂ったように笑い、支離滅裂な鳴き声とつぶやきを発し続ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “这就对了，不担心是件好事！我再也不用担心了，有什么必要惊慌失措呢？若是真的有什么需要担心的事情，我们会第一个听到，之后立刻告诉你。不过，伊迪拉可不是你需要担心的事情，她再也不会让你担心了。毕竟，我并非孤身一人！我从来没感觉这么好，这么有安全感！是不是，我小小的低语者们？”{n}她疯狂地傻笑起来，随后陷入了语无伦次的自言自语中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And rightly so — not worrying is a good thing! I'm not worrying anymore — why make such a fuss? We'll be the first to hear and tell you about everything you should be worried about. But Idira won't be one of them — she won't be worrying you anymore. After all, I'm not alone, and I feel so good and so safe! Isn't that right, my little whisperers?" {n}She giggles madly, then descends into incoherent cooing and mumbling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这就对了，不担心是件好事！我再也不用担心了，有什么必要惊慌失措呢？若是真的有什么需要担心的事情，我们会第一个听到，之后立刻告诉你。不过，伊迪拉可不是你需要担心的事情，她再也不会让你担心了。毕竟，我并非孤身一人！我从来没感觉这么好，这么有安全感！是不是，我小小的低语者们？”{n}她疯狂地傻笑起来，随后陷入了语无伦次的自言自语中。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Et à juste titre. Il est bon de ne pas s'inquiéter ! Moi, je ne m'inquiète plus de rien. Pourquoi en faire tout un plat ? Nous serons les premières à vous informer de ce dont vous avez lieu de vous préoccuper. Mais Idira n'en fera pas partie ; elle ne vous causera plus de souci. Je ne suis pas seule, après tout, et je me sens en sécurité ! N'est-ce pas, mes petits murmures ? » {n}demande-t-elle avant de glousser comme une folle puis de se mettre à marmonner de façon incohérente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And rightly so — not worrying is a good thing! I'm not worrying anymore — why make such a fuss? We'll be the first to hear and tell you about everything you should be worried about. But Idira won't be one of them — she won't be worrying you anymore. After all, I'm not alone, and I feel so good and so safe! Isn't that right, my little whisperers?" {n}She giggles madly, then descends into incoherent cooing and mumbling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et à juste titre. Il est bon de ne pas s'inquiéter ! Moi, je ne m'inquiète plus de rien. Pourquoi en faire tout un plat ? Nous serons les premières à vous informer de ce dont vous avez lieu de vous préoccuper. Mais Idira n'en fera pas partie ; elle ne vous causera plus de souci. Je ne suis pas seule, après tout, et je me sens en sécurité ! N'est-ce pas, mes petits murmures ? » {n}demande-t-elle avant de glousser comme une folle puis de se mettre à marmonner de façon incohérente.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Und zwar zu recht — sich keine Sorgen zu machen, ist gut! Ich mache mir auch keine Sorgen mehr. Warum so einen Zinnober veranstalten? Wir werden es als Erste erfahren und Euch sofort über alles unterrichten, weshalb Ihr Euch Sorgen machen solltet. Aber Idira wird nicht dazugehören. Sie wird Euch keine Sorgen mehr machen. Ich bin schließlich nicht allein, und ich fühle mich so gut und so sicher! Nicht wahr, meine kleinen Flüsterer?" {n}Sie kichert manisch und beginnt dann, nur noch unverständlich zu glucksen und zu murmeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And rightly so — not worrying is a good thing! I'm not worrying anymore — why make such a fuss? After all, I'm not alone, and I feel so good and so safe! Isn't that right, my little whisperers?" {n}She giggles madly, then descends into incoherent cooing and mumbling.{/n}

languages.text: "Haklısın da... Kafayı çok yormamak iyi bir şey! Ben de artık kafamı çok yormuyorum. Telaşa ne gerek var ki zaten? Kafanı yorman gerekecek mevzuları ilk biz duyarız, sen de ilk bizden duyarsın. Ancak İdira, bu mevzulardan biri olmayacak. İdira'ya kafanı yormana gerek yok artık. Ne de olsa yalnız değilim. Çok güzel bir şey bu. Bayağı güvende hissediyorum! Öyle değil mi minik fısıldayanlarım?" {n}Delicesine kıkırdıyor, ardından kendini anlamsız mırıltılarla fısıltılara kaptırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And rightly so — not worrying is a good thing! I'm not worrying anymore — why make such a fuss? We'll be the first to hear and tell you about everything you should be worried about. But Idira won't be one of them — she won't be worrying you anymore. After all, I'm not alone, and I feel so good and so safe! Isn't that right, my little whisperers?" {n}She giggles madly, then descends into incoherent cooing and mumbling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın da... Kafayı çok yormamak iyi bir şey! Ben de artık kafamı çok yormuyorum. Telaşa ne gerek var ki zaten? Kafanı yorman gerekecek mevzuları ilk biz duyarız, sen de ilk bizden duyarsın. Ancak İdira, bu mevzulardan biri olmayacak. İdira'ya kafanı yormana artık gerek yok. Ne de olsa yalnız değilim. Çok güzel bir şey bu. Bayağı güvende hissediyorum! Öyle değil mi minik dedikoducularım?" {n}Delicesine kıkırdıyor, ardından kendini anlamsız mırıltılarla fısıltılara kaptırıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
